data.title: Online Library of Liberty
data.meta_description: Vol. 1 of a massive 5 volume work in which Plutarch muses on all manner of topics ranging from virtue and vice, friendship, flattery, the nature of love, stoic philosophy, fate, to the nature of government.
data.text:
Plutarch (author)

Ralph Waldo Emerson (introduction)

William W. Goodwin (translator)

Vol. 1 of a massive 5 volume work in which Plutarch muses on all manner of topics ranging from virtue and vice, friendship, flattery, the nature of love, stoic philosophy, fate, to the nature of government.

EBook PDF

This text-based PDF or EBook was created from the HTML version of this book and is part of the Portable Library of Liberty.

ePub

ePub standard file for your iPad or any e-reader compatible with that format

Facsimile PDF

This is a facsimile or image-based PDF made from scans of the original book.

Facsimile PDF small

This is a compressed facsimile or image-based PDF made from scans of the original book.

Kindle

This is an E-book formatted for Amazon Kindle devices.

Copyright
